result.reason: Feature request to select and edit multiple connections at once in the connection tree, enabling bulk property changes
result.approach: Enable multi-select in the ConnectionTree TreeView control, then extend the property grid to detect common properties across selected connections and apply bulk edits to all selected items simultaneously
